; Wed, 19 Jul 2023 15:45:05 GMT https://twitter.com/elonmusk/status/1681691639922806784 https://twitter.com/elonmusk/status/1681691639922806784 Elon Musk RT Starlink: Nearly 300 cruise ships are now set to use Starlink to keep their passengers and crews connected with high-speed internet while on rivers...RT Starlink
现在，近 300 艘游轮将使用 Starlink 让乘客和船员在河流和海上保持高速互联网连接 🛰️🛳️


Dima Zeniuk：SpaceX 的 Starlink 已在 Costa Tuscany 上引入，Costa Cruises 计划在 12 月之前在其船队的其余部分推出增强型 Wi-Fi。 🚢

@Starlink @elonmusk https://t.co/jRYEnSD7HD
